title: HOOOT Rechargeable LED Bike Light Set, 2 Super Bright Front Bicycle Headlights, 2 Back Rear Taillights, IPX4 Waterproof, 4 Light Mode Options; Easy to Install for Men Women| Road Safety and Style
features: ✔️ ADVANCED CHARGING TECHNOLOGY- Long Lasting and USB Rechargeable 650mAh lithium battery that lasts up to 10 hours. Recharges using a Micro-USB cable that connects to any device with a USB port. Headlight LED indicator turns green and Taillight LED indicator turns orange when fully charged. IPX 4 WATER RESISTANT.

✔️ SUPER BRIGHT & FOUR LIGHT MODE OPTION- Upgraded Cree LED Chips. The Headlight and Taillight feature a One-Touch switch with four different lighting modes to provide you with maximum visibility and extra safety. Adjusts to Full Brightness, Half Brightness, Fast Flashing, and Slow Flashing depending on your preference.

✔️ EASY INSTALLATION- NO TOOLS NEEDED- Easy to mount or remove for they are equipped with silicone straps that can be stretched up to 4.72” fitting many size seat posts, handlebars, seat risers, backpacks, and helmets.

✔️ VERSATILE, MORE THAN A BIKE LIGHT- Can be used as an emergency flashlight, keep it inside your car, basement, attic, and emergency kit. Use it when you're running, jogging, hiking, camping, walking your dog, cycling, changing a tire, nighttime family/kids activities, power outage and MORE! Perfect gift for family & friends.

✔️ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: HOOOT is committed to providing you with the best quality products and customer service. Our company ensures 100% customer satisfaction with warranty of 12 months from the date of purchase .Please feel free to contact us with any concerns.
description: Make Yourself Visible With The HOOOT LED Bike Lights
4 Light Mode Options & Time Duration With Full Charge:
* 3.5 hrs Of Full Brightness* 10 hrs of Half Brightness* 10.5 hrs Of Slow Flashing* 10 hrs Of Fast Flashing
* 2.5 hrs OF Full Brightness* 9 hrs Of Half Brightness* 9.5 hrs Of Slow Flashing* 9 hrs Of Fast Flashing

1. Attach the micro USB cable to the Bike light's micro USB input port 2. Insert the other end of the cable into either an AC adapter connected to a wall socket or an active computer USB port 3. The LED indicator of front light will turn to green when light is fully charged and the rear light will turn to orange when fully chrged.
2 X Head lights (White Light) 2 X Tail lights (Red Light) 4 X USB cables 6 X Silicone mounting Straps 1 X Instruction Manual 1 X Complementary Bag
